author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Eli Lilly To Acquire Aurka Pharma
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Eli Lilly and Co:
* LILLY WILL ACQUIRE ALL SHARES OF AURKA PHARMA * AURKA PHARMA SHAREHOLDERS WILL RECEIVE AN UPFRONT PAYMENT OF $110 MILLION
* AURKA PHARMA SHAREHOLDERS ARE ALSO ELIGIBLE TO RECEIVE UP TO $465 MILLION IN REGULATORY AND SALES MILESTONES
* THERE WILL BE NO CHANGE TO LILLY’S 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE GUIDANCE AS A RESULT OF DEAL
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $5.15 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
